name: Laptop Stand
description:
The Laptop Stand is designed and made in Melbourne and is presented as a sustainable and environmentally responsible alternative to similar products available on the market.

The Laptop Stand is a low-cost, recyclable, lightweight, readily portable and user-friendly product. It has been designed to suit all laptop types and sizes.

The design of the Laptop Stand is based on an A4 standard paper size, which in this concept is split into two symmetrical halves.

The design allows the laptop screen to be opened and positioned at eye level during use. This helps with ergonomics and to lessen the strain on the neck muscles. 

The keyboard lies on a forward inclined position, directed to the user and enhancing their comfort when typing.

The stand, having minimal surface contact with the computer, allows for easy heat dissipation and passive cooling to occur.

The Laptop Stand is made from 100% post-consumer recycled paper waste manufactured into a 10mm thick tough board. 

The stand is completely recyclable and can be disposed of in the paper-recycled bin at its end-of-life use.

Key objectives of this project is to support local manufacturing and the use of recyclable materials, beyond just making a functional product.

The dimensions of the Laptop Stand is 297x160 mm (folded).

Prices are in Australian Dollars.

Please contact us for details on bulk orders.

name: Fold Cards - set of 6
description:
The fold card is presented as an alternative to the conventional card + envelope as a single item. 

Messages and greetings can be written freely composed without conforming to any grid or alignment. Playful arrangement of the messages is encouraged.

The card opens out into a single A4 size sheet and folds back into a neat package. It is sealed with the stamp prior to postage or left as is if postage is not required.

The cards are printed on 100% post-consumer recycled paper with vegetable based ink.

The approximate size for each card is 143x70 mm (folded) and unfolds into an A4 size sheet (297x210 mm).

Please refer to our website for folding instructions: 
http://www.vckw.com.au/fold-card.html 
or
 http://www.vckw.com.au/images/A4%20Cards%20Instructions15.gif

Prices are in Australian Dollars.

Please contact us for details on bulk orders.

name: Laptop Bag - Tartan
description:
The laptop bag is designed following the Japanese minimalist aesthetic of functional simplicity while reducing fabric wastage.

The bag is made from remnants kimono fabric with bamboo fibre padding. All sourced textiles are made from 100% natural materials.

The design incorporates an integrated and discreet carry handle and a large internal pocket.

The bag will suit laptops sizes up to 15 inches.

The bags are hand made and produced in limited edition.

name: Laptop Bag - Felt
description:
The laptop bag is designed following the Japanese minimalist aesthetic of functional simplicity while reducing fabric wastage.

The bag is made from wool felt (external lining), remnants kimono fabric (internal lining) with bamboo fibre padding. All sourced textiles are made from 100% natural materials.

The design incorporates an integrated and discreet carry handle and a large internal pocket.

The bag will suit laptops sizes up to 15 inches.

The bags are hand made and produced in limited edition.
